remarks: The Cauchy-Schwarz inequality for a complex pre-Hilbert space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Oct-2015.)
statement:
tchval.n $e |- G = ( toCHil ` W ) $.
tchcph.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
tchcph.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
tchcph.1 $e |- ( ph -> W e. PreHil ) $.
tchcph.2 $e |- ( ph -> F = ( CCfld |`s K ) ) $.
tchcph.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
tchcph.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. K /\ x e. RR /\ 0 <_ x ) ) -> ( sqrt ` x ) e. K ) $.
tchcph.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. V ) -> 0 <_ ( x ., x ) ) $.
tchcph.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
ipcau2.n $e |- N = ( norm ` G ) $.
ipcau2.c $e |- C = ( ( Y ., X ) / ( Y ., Y ) ) $.
ipcau2.3 $e |- ( ph -> X e. V ) $.
ipcau2.4 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. V ) $.
ipcau2 $p |- ( ph -> ( abs ` ( X ., Y ) ) <_ ( ( N ` X ) x. ( N ` Y ) ) ) $.
